name: Tantei Opera Milky Holmes 1.5 Dai-3-Wa: Norowareshi Maken
name_original: Tantei Opera Milky Holmes 1.5 Dai-3-Wa: Norowareshi Maken
description:
Tantei Opera Milky Holmes 1.5 Dai-3-Wa: Norowareshi Maken is an action game. It came out on 08-05-2013.
You can play Tantei Opera Milky Holmes 1.5 Dai-3-Wa: Norowareshi Maken on PSP.
